item.description:
This is a party for those that are single and have single friends they think would have a blast meeting others to date or be friends. A speed dancing mixer will be hosted by Maria Fiora- who will teach some fun swing, and latin dancing - we will also play the dating game, drinks, food and more=sINGLES WHO miNGLE
aDMISSION IS -you must bring a single friend who isnt attached and $15 admission( helps with having a couple staff members to help clean up and assist with dancing) with the catch of bringing at least one single friend who is not in a relationship- bring a drink also or food item to share, we will also have items. After there will be dj's music,giveaways, and more.
Please RSVP me directly at mariafiora@optonline.net or call me
if you are coming from new haven area there is no traffic at that time coming south.
Dress is sexy and nice-no jeans. age group please 30-60's
What have you got to lose but have a great time and meet some really run people!

check in between 7:30-8pm -then the fun will start
item.why: WE NEED TO GET A BIGGER FUN GROUP and MIX SINGLE FRIENDS FROM ALL OVER CT.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: SMINGLE ON APRIL FOOLS
